title: Number of cigarettes smoked daily in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Number of cigarettes in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Number of cigarettes 6 to 10 and lowest at Number of cigarettes 31 to 50.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Number of cigarettes is 22.0.
